title: Sunny Garden Studio, includes all utilities
posting_body: Remodeled garden level apartment with gas stove, granite counter tops and open floor plan.
Gas, water, electricity and wireless internet all included (valued at over $100/month).
Friendly neighborly block of West Oakland.
Sunny front patio and lovely garden lot next to house for you to plant flowers or potted herbs!
Just one and half miles from downtown Oakland, seven blocks to West Oakland Bart station and easy access to all freeways.
Tenant must be willing to sign a 6 month lease.
Upon move in tenant pays total of $2,750 (first month's rent plus security deposit of $1000), (security deposit doesn't count as last month's rent).
Please email me if you would like to come and take a look at the unit.
